nodes.text: The Type IV-A Stardock was a model of space station designed by Kuat Drive Yards.
The Type IV-A Stardock was 1,900 meters across, staffed by 200 officers, up to 50 workers and 24 gunners, and was armed with eight turbolaser turrets. It could carry 5,000 metric tons.
Ships up to and including an Imperial-class Star Destroyer could be repaired by a station of this type.
The Wroona Stardock was a Type IV-A Spacedock that orbited the planet of Wroona.
